title: Latency is high
description: The amount of time it takes for a specific operation to be processed within the Elasticsearch cluster is known as latency. This monitor tracks the query execution time to identify potential performance degradation within the Elasticsearch cluster.

definition.message:
The time spent on processing queries is increasing ({{value}} s/query).
You may want to look for potential resource bottlenecks, or investigate whether you need to [optimize your queries.](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/elasticsearch-performance-scaling-problems/)
definition.name: [ElasticSearch] Time spent on queries is high on {{host.name}}
definition.query: avg(last_5m):monotonic_diff( avg:elasticsearch.search.query.time{*} by {host} ) / monotonic_diff( avg:elasticsearch.search.query.total{*} by {host} ) > 3
